text.en: Unique. Lost Tribes specific. Only playable if The One Ring and your Wose-chief are both at Mount Doom during the site phase. Make a roll. Add 1 for each Wose ranger in your Wose-chief´s company you decide to tap for this purpose and 1 for each Wose-chief follower in the company. If the result is less than 6, your Wose-chief is eliminated. If the result is greater than 9, you win the game; else, discard this card.

quote.en: “...a flicker of their true self struggled to break free from the Ring’s grasp, yearning to cast off the weight of this alluring but treacherous artifact.” —LotRII

text.en: Wose-chief only. Playable on your Wose-Chief. You may play this card from your sideboard. The selected Wose-Chief becomes your Wose-Chief for the purpose of playing Wose-Chief specific cards. Additionally, you may put into play a second Wose-Chief from your hand or discard pile. This Wose-Chief is not considered your Wose-Chief for the purpose of playing Wose-Chief specific cards. He requires 0 influence to control if controlled by your Wose-Chief or 2 points of influence if controlled by general influence and may only be controlled by general influence or by your main Wose-Chief. -3 MP if any of your Wose-Chiefs is elliminated.

If character is a Wose-Chief, he makes a corruption check modified by -1, else character makes a corruption check modified by -4.

Playable on a Man character with a mind of 3 or less at one of your Wose-haven [H] (or in your starting company in lieu of a minor item).+1 to his direct influence against Wose characters and Wose factions. If the character´s home site is one of the following: Eryn Vorn, Dunnish Clan-hold, Vale of Erech or Cameth Brin he gets an additional +1 to his direct influence which may only be used against factions playable in these regions.

Unique. Watchstone. Playable at any tapped Hidden site by a pûkel-magic-using character if you remove from the game, for this purpose, a warrior character in his company if no other Watchstone is at the site. Tap the character. This site is never discarded or returned to its location deck. Modifiers apply to all Wose characters in the same and in adjacent regions to the site where this card has been played. +2 prowess and +1 body (to a maximum of 6 and 9 respectively).

Unique. Playable on a pûkel-magic-using character at a Ruins & Lairs [R] in Cardolan, Rohan, Anduin Vales or Harondor if his company has defeated a unique Undead manifestation. The site becomes a [B] and loses all automatic attacks. Target character receives: +3 direct influence against Men, Men factions, Woses and Wose factions. +1 to all corruption checks.

quote.en: “Over the years they have become accustomed to perils that would daunt many folk.” —Woses of the Black Wood

text.en: Corruption. Does not affect Hobbits, Ringwraiths nor Wizards. A character receives 1 corruption point (2 if played on a Wose). Target character makes a corruption check each time he taps.Additionally, all Pûkel Totem´s mind values are reduced by 1. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. During his organization phase, a character with this card may tap to attempt to remove it. Make a roll (or draw a #): if this result is greater than 5, discard this card.

Unique. Lost Tribes Specific. Playable if you tap, for this specific reason: 3 Coloring Stones and 3 Wose factions you control. Place this card on your Wose-Chief if he is play, if so played: your Wose-Chief becomes The Keeper of Colors. +7 to your general influence, Wose characters with a mind attribute of 2 or less controlled by general influence or in the same company as your Wose-Chief require no influence to control. Your Wose-Chief may tap to bring a Wose character into play under general or direct influence at any non [D] or [S] with any company. This does not count against the one character per turn limit.

Unique. Undead. Haunted. Barrow Downs has an additional automatic-attack: Undead—1 strike at 12/9.In addition, as a permanent-event, it will remain in play until tapped during the opponent’s movement/hazard phase (tapping counts against the hazard limit). When tapped, The Last King of Cardolan becomes a short-event that allows you to search for Sleepless Malice in your discard pile and bring it directly into play (does not count against the hazard limit).

Mam-ugi-mam specific. Playable if you are Mam-ugi-mam and have at least 3 allies and 3 factions in play. Mam-ugi-mam need not be at the appropriate site when making an influence attempt on a resource or character (opponent’s or yours). Such an influence check is modified by half (rounded up) of Mam-ugi-mam’s unused general influence (to a maximum of 10) instead of his unused direct influence. Subtract from the attempt the number of regions between Mam-ugi-mam’s site and the site where the influence attempt would normally be made. Discard if you have fewer than 3 allies and 3 factions in play. Cannot be duplicated.

In addition to adopting the given attributes, Wose-Chief´s skills become Warrior/Ranger. When moving to or from a site in a Wilderness [w] his prowess is only modified by -1 when not tapping to face a strike. Wose-chief may bear, but not use, items and and may play one less region card.

Unique. Artifact. +2 to direct influence, and +2 to prowess (to a maximum of 8).Tap Thornbite Staff to untap spirit-magic or pûkel-magic-using bearer.You may transfer Thornbite Staff to another character in the same company during the site phase. Bearer makes a corruption check.
Unique. Lost Tribes specific. Tika is considered a Wose (in addition to being a Man) if there is a Wose in his company.Against Nazgûl +7 her prowess and his body is halved (round up).

quote.en: “Much of her youthful strength and splendor, however, has passed. Once one of the most beautiful Wose women who ever lived,” —Woses of the Black Wood

text.en: Unique. She may not be one of the starting characters. She may only be brought into play at one of her home sites. Tap Tolwen and another untapped character or Ent ally in her company to heal target character in her company, from wounded to well and untapped.

quote.en: “Capable of healing almost any physical injury and had the ability to perform Lifegiving” —Ents of Fangorn

text.en: Awakened Plant. Two strikes.May be played at Eryn Vorn, Drûadan Forest, Old Forest and Wellinghall.May also be played keyed to Cardolan, Old Pûkel Land, Heart of Mirkwood, Southern Mirkwood, Western Mirkwood, and Woodland Realm; and may also be played at Ruins & Lairs [R] and Shadow-holds [S] in these regions.

Magic. Pûkel-magic. Playable on a pûkel-magic-using character. Tap any combination of two Ent and/or Ent-wife allies in the same company to untap a site where Ent/Ent-wife allies are playable. Character makes a corruption check modified with a -2 right after every untap attempt.

Unique. Magic. Pûkel-magic. Playable on a pûkel-magic-using character at a Haven [H]. Search your deck for a resource card, then shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it. Character makes a corruption check modified by -3.Remove this card from the game.

Channeling. Playable on a Pûkel Totem. Tap the Pûkel Totem. -1 to his mind value.You may discard a Channeling under your control (including this one) to cancel the effects of a hazard permanent event played on any of your companies.If Tribe Blessings is discarded, you may bring a Watch-Stone resource from your sideboard or discard pile into your play deck. Shuffle your play deck afterwards. Cannot be duplicated on a given Pûkel Totem. Discard if Pûkel-Totem moves or abandons play.

Playable on a character only if his company contains at least a warrior, a scout and a ranger. Tap to modify target character´s prowess by +3 against a strike or target character receives a +2 against a corruption check. Target character must be in the same company.Discard Tribe Tactics during the organization phase if playable conditions are not met.

Unique. Lost Tribes Specific. Manifestation of Spawn of Ungoliant. Playable at The Pûkel-deeps and The Gem-deeps if the influence check is greater than 12.Modifications: influencer eliminates a character in the influencing company (+4). All attacks by Spawn manifestations against any of your companies are considered as detainment. Any company moving in The Pûkel-deeps or The Gem-deeps faces one attack:Spawn — three strikes at 15/7 prowess/body.

Magic. Pûkel-magic. Playable on a pûkel-magic-using character. Tap the character and reveal up to 8 cards from the top of your play deck. Choose one to put into your hand and shuffle the remaining ones into your discard pile and/or play deck. Unless the character is a Wose-Chief, character makes a corruption check modified by -2.

quote.en: “they could raise an army of Undead from their graves through the use of rare stones and unspeakable rituals.” —Raiders of Cardolan

text.en: Channeling. Playable on a Pûkel Totem. Tap the Pûkel Totem. -2 to his mind value (-1 if played on Great Healing Foot or Great Mother). Tap a Channeling and an Enchanted Tattoo to untap bearer if not in a [D] or [d]. Cannot be duplicated on a given Pûkel Totem. Discard if Pûkel-Totem moves or abandons play.

Unique. Ent-wife. Playable at any Hidden site in a Wilderness [w]. May not be attacked by automatic attacks or hazards keyed to her site.Discard Wandlimb if his company moves through a Shadow-land [s], a Dark-domain [d] or to non Hidden site Under-Deeps site.

quote.en: “At the time of the War of the Ring, Treebeard had not seen his beloved Wandlimb for over 3,000 years.” —Lords of Middle-earth Vol III

text.en: Unique. Coloring Stone. Artifact. Playable at any site in Elven Shore, Eriadoran Coast and Andrast Coast.+1 prowess (to a maximum of 8), +1 body (to a maximum of 10), +1 to direct influence.Pûkel-magic-using character only: Tap to add +1 to prowess and +1 body (to a maximum of 6 and 9 respectively) to target character in the same company as the bearer until end of turn. Bearer makes a corruption check.

quote.en: “Used to tattoo at the coming of a Wose adulthood with water colored powers.” —Riders of Rohan

text.en: Animal. Three strikes. All body checks resulting from successful strikes are modified by an additional +1.May be played keyed to swamp.

quote.en: “The critical strike was accompanied by a muscle poison that caused bleeding, bruises, and swelling” —Realms of Arda

text.en: Magic. Pûkel-magic. Playable on a pûkel-magic-using character facing an attack. All characters in his company receive +2 prowess and -1 body against the attack. Unless he is a Wose-Chief, character makes a corruption check modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated against a given attack.

quote.en: “Grievances, broken promises...all leading to a great anger, as if their will were driven by revenge” —Tribal Lore

text.en: Artifact. Playable on a pûkel-magic-using character.If bearer is a pûkel-magic-using character:Tap to cancel an attack against the bearer´s company.Tap to modify by -2 the prowess and body of any hazard creature attack keyed to a [S], D, [s] or [d] . You choose targets of such an attack´s strikes (regardless of tapped status, wounded status, and the normal abilities of the attack). Bearer makes a corruption check.

Weapon. +2 prowess (to a maximum of 7).During each of your organization phases, you may discard a non Wose character in bearer’s company and place him “off to the side” with this card. This character does not provide any MP. If you have at least 1 character with this card, you receive this card’s values within brackets.

Lost Tribes Specific. Playable on a Man character. If character´s mind attribute is equal to 2 or less, that character does not require general influence points to be controlled. If character´s mind attribute is equal to 3 or more, character gets +2 to his direct influence against Woses or Wose factions. May not be duplicated on a given character. You may start the game with this card in lieu of playing a minor item.
Weapon. Blowpipe. Tap to allow the bearer not to tap against one strike. Discard if its bearer is not a Wose.

quote.en: “Used by the Woses to shoot poisoned darts known as Pûra” —Woses of the Black Wood

text.en: Lost Tribes Specific.-1 to all of his corruption checks.

quote.en: “All groups of the Woses are composed nearly equaIIy of Warriors and Rangers.” —MERP: Riders of Rohan

text.en: Lost Tribes Specific. Wose Laborer is considered a Man (in addition to being a Wose) if there is a Man in his company. -1 to all of his corruption checks. -1 to influence checks against all factions.

quote.en: “Wose laborers often know their surroundings better than most.”—The Lost Tribes

text.en: During your organization phase, you may take a Wose character with a mind value of 5 or less from your sideboard or discard pile and place it “off to the side” with this card. This character gives no marshalling points. A maximum of two characters may be with this card at one time. You may play a character placed with this card as though it were in your hand.
Unique. Lost Tribes Specific. Discard Wose Sentinel to cancel an attack against his company. -1 to all of his corruption checks. -1 to influence checks against all factions.

quote.en: “Less experienced than the Wose Chieftain guardians, these hunters are supreme in the use of group warfare” —The Lost Tribes

text.en: Unique. Lost Tribes Specific.Can use pûkel-magic.+2 to all rolls required for his company to move to an adjacent site in the Under deeps.

quote.en: “Wose shamans often used ingredients from the deeper caves for their rituals” —Tribal Lore

text.en: Lost Tribes Specific. Wose Tracker may be played from your sideboard as if it were in your hand. -1 to all of his corruption checks.-1 to influence checks against all factions.

quote.en: “Silently vigilant” —Woses of the Black Wood

text.en: Unique. Lost Tribes Specific. Playable at tapped or untapped Wose Passage-hold if the influence check is greater than 8.Standard Modifications: Woses (+2), Men (+1).Each of your other Wose factions give an additional marshalling point.

quote.en: “Their late descendants near the borders of Rohan were called Woses, or “Wudu-Wasa”, by the Rohirrim.” —Woses of the Black Wood
